channel.title: CVE Feed for WpOpal -- Opal Widgets For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WpOpal -- Opal Widgets For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-33649|2024-06-06T17:51:36.940Z -- wpopal -- opal%20widgets%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WpOpal Opal Widgets For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Opal Widgets For Elementor: from n/a through 1.6.9.
